short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically create multiple tags in AEM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AEM Multitag Creator, simplifies the process of adding multiple tags in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM). This extension automates the tagging workflow, allowing users to swiftly organize content without manual intervention. By providing a user-friendly interface, Multitag Creator enhances productivity and efficiency for AEM users, enabling them to focus on content creation rather than tedious administrative tasks. Whether managing a single page or an entire website, Multitag Creator streamlines the tagging process, saving valuable time and effort. Install Multitag Creator now to optimize your AEM workflow and unlock seamless content management in Adobe Experience Manager.
